answers.answer: If everything goes normal and they do not suspect you may have it. They will do the test between 28 and 30 weeks
Where I am from they do it inbetween 24 and 28 weeks.  So every place is different.
Dont do it. It uses red and yellow dyes which are terrible for the human body. Why put yourself or the baby through the side effects of harmful dyes?

question: Im 22weeks today so im just wondering when do I go to do the gestational diabetes test?
